title: Italian Gourmet Food & Wine Escape in Perugia
description: Picture yourself sipping a glass of red wine in the Italian countryside with a five-night escape to Italy’s food and wine capital of Perugia. Stay at Le Silve di Armenzano - ranked one of the top ten hotels in Assisi - and enjoy daily breakfasts, nightly cocktails, a three-course ‘Taste of Italy’ pasta dinner, a local wine tasting and more.
offer_address: Armenzano di Assisi, 06081 Assisi PG, Italy

title: Gourmet Italy: Food & Wine Escape with Local Wine Tasting & Nightly Cocktail
description: Picture yourself sipping a glass of red wine in the Italian countryside with a four, five or seven-night escape to Perugia - Italy’s charming food and wine capital. Stay at Le Silve di Armenzano - ranked one of the top ten hotels in Assisi - and tantalise your taste buds with daily buffet breakfast, a nightly cocktail each, three-course ‘Taste of Italy’ pasta dinner for two with a glass of prosecco and a local wine tasting.
offer_address: Armenzano di Assisi, 06081 Assisi PG, Italy

title: Italian Food & Wine Escape in Perugia
description: Experience the history, food and wine of Italy’s charming Perugia province with five nights at Le Tre Vaselle Resort. Includes daily buffet breakfasts, welcome drinks, a bottle of wine, a three-course dining experience with wine, cocktails, spa access and credit, a late checkout and more.
